Lowell Thomas narrates a film shot in Tibet, describing traditional greetings, jewelry, and dress. He shows a man painting a religious portrait and awes at the gold-encrusted temples. During scenes of the monastery he tells about how the first born son of every family is dedicated to being a monk. The first pictures of these monks in this monastery are taken. ; Format: 35mm; Picture: Color; Audio: Optical; Type: Positive

LT narrating footage of Tibet. The scenes show the Lhasa palace. On a mountain oppose the palace monks blow horns made of human bones. There is a brief scene of the Dalai Lama's mother. LT then says that will go to see that Dalai Lama himself, this is the first time he had been filmed, according to LT. Footage shows the Dalai lama briefly; he is sitting on a throne, and looks very young. LT says that he will never marry.LT and his crew then leave Lhasa on yak skin boats. LT's father falls sick and they have to trek six days to find a doctor. In order the carry on, they construct a sedan chair for LT's dad, that is carried by Tibetan people. They trek for 16 days to reach India, while LT's dad is being carried by Tibetans; the dad loses 25 pounds on the journey. This trek includes a arduous journey over the Himalayas.; Format: 35mm; Picture: Color, N/A - Audio track only; Audio: Optical; Type: Positive

Lowell Thomas and his son travel through the mountains with guides and other men to help them carry their film equipment on their way into Tibet. Upon arrival, they're given gifts and Lowell Thomas Jr. explains the people's belief in reincarnation. A monk explains how the country's independence had been stripped by Chinese invasion and Thomas explains their daily routine centered around drinking tea. ; Format: 35mm; Picture: Color, N/A - Audio track only; Audio: Optical; Type: Positive

Lowell Thomas narrates a Tibetan festival full of warrior displays, dancing, and story reenactments. Tibetan lancers dress in full garb and show off their skill on the field. Some attempt to hit a bulls eye with guns or arrows, while on a horse at full gallop. ; Format: 35mm; Picture: Color; Audio: Optical; Type: Positive

Pieces of Lowell Thomas's adventure into Tibet are played through. Scenes show them starting on their journey, passing sacred shrines, and people they pass along the way. In Tibet the film shows the Dalai Lama and scenes of people dancing and a festival drama.; Format: 35mm; Picture: Color; Audio: Optical; Type: Positive

Short clips of the Tibetan people, from the peasant to the royal, are recorded. Lowell Thomas narrates the life of the peasant and the importance of the yak in their lifestyle. Lowell Thomas talking about Tibet and its culture, Tibet is the home of the largest monastery whose name translates to rice heap, LT and the llamas speak about issues around the world, Lowell Thomas Jr. talks about Buddhism and its practices, Jr. also speaks about Tibets relationship with China and India, Jr. also talks about Tibetan politics and their interest in western politics, they invited LT and Jr. to Tibet so they can voice the concerns of Tibet to the western world; Format: 35mm; Picture: Black & White; Audio: Optical; Type: Positive

No wheels used in Tibet, helps to stop invaders.; Format: 35mm; Picture: N/A - Audio track only; Audio: Optical; Type: Positive

Two men talk to one another. One of them gestures to bridge in background. Shot of man wearing hat and glasses. Woman with braids walks past him. Shot of two hats. Someone holds one while the other is on a table. Man faces away from camera, he's wearing expensive looking garbs, another person is patting him, maybe to make sure everything is in place. Lowell Thomas holds up Tibetan child. Shots of palace/city. Tibetans stand with palace in background. More visuals of the city with mountains in the background. Two men stare at landscape. Man plays instrument. Man leans over table with objects and holds up weird object.Three men walk down pathway surrounded by trees. Several people walk towards gate. Shots of statues and buildings. Dog walks towards person. Shots of a field, then paintings of animals, and people. 3 Tibetans, one sits in middle, other two stand on either side of him, surrounded by flowers. More shots of art before Tibetans walk down a path. Group of men on boat. two donkeys stand in front of it. Close up of the two donkeys.; Format: 35mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Negative

Two people in robes with what looks like a castle in the background, people stand before a monk at his seat, a very large building sits atop a mountain, people in a garden like area, closeup of a little kid, someone in front of a tent, view of a tower, a map of the USSR, someone leading donkeys, someone walks by and a large building is visible in the distance, someone riding what seems to be cattle, monks among a large crowd, a man facing a building with bells outside, closeup of a monk, a monk walking across a stage, donkeys walking by, people on donkeys along a lake, someone overlooking a city from a distance; Format: 35mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Negative

Shot of city from above. Donkeys walking through water. People walking through water. Various shots of natives in robes. A few paintings. Small farm with house in background. Farmer looking man holding instrument. Dog. Lowell Thomas holding object and examining some others on the table. Shots of city/palace. Lowell standing next to man who is playing an instrument. Lowell Thomas holding up native girl. Shot of native's garbs. Lowell Thomas and his son standing with a few natives.; Format: 35mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Negative

Monk outside of a temple, roofs of temples, men wearing patterned ponchos, man showing other a sword or staff, bulls laying down, man walking past them, boxes of beads and necklaces, man sitting behind table of beads, sea sponges on table, croup of natives, table of fabrics, Asian people smiling, natives with horses, people gathered outside temples, outdoor market in a small village, bulls with saddles, people standing around, group of bulls outside buildings in the village, men riding the bulls, close up of native wearing large hat, aerial view of the village, Lowell Thomas with natives, native holding food and gifts, men with horses, riding horses, man sitting with little boy fixing something, men sitting in a circle, 1 man standing with a sword, men on a small boat, men on the shore with horses, man on mountainside looking out at the water, group walking through a path on the mountainside, man setting up camera, men walking up mountain with a horse, horses carrying boxes, walking at the bottom of the mountain near the water, horses carrying supplies, Asian man holding baby alpaca, native woman fixing her hair, native using staff/sword to break rocks, man carrying a raft on his back to shore to collection of cargo/supplies, Lowell Thomas talking to natives, close up of men next to rock wall, men on the raft in the water, zoom out of water, mountains behind, raft in distance, close up of man rowing, close up of other men in the raft, 2 rafts, close up of native man, CBS equipment box, people on land carrying equipment, bulls carrying supplies, men with a horse, fish near rocks, man catches them, horses standing behind, group of bulls, horses walking around brick building, walking through brick archways, natives holding puppies. ; Format: 35mm; Picture: Black & White; Audio: ; Type: Negative

End credits, mountains, Lowell Thomas and other man walking down a staircase from an airplane, men on horses at the bottom of a mountain with an elaborate building, monks/native men, group of natives gathered watching native on stage, man standing under a tent/awning, native women in the background, men in rafts, men riding horses, airplane wing, airplane at airport, 2 men and a woman in a jeep, people gathered around the jeep, people walking along the mountainside, people on horses riding through archways, zoom out of riding along mountainside, open land, herd of cows, group of men riding horses, close up of native man in a group, Lowell Thomas sitting on a platform being carried by others, rocks, Lowell Thomas on platform being carried down stairs, Lowell Thomas on a platform waving, man wearing a uniform, people speaking to Lowell Thomas on the platform, men on horses, carrying Lowell Thomas around the mountain, others riding horses, people and horses gathered, brushing a horse, ocean/lake, donkey, people in a raft, man rowing, natives standing outside. ; Format: 35mm; Picture: Black & White; Audio: ; Type: Negative

Monks in a temple, close up of 3 monks, 1 monk, man setting u a small camera, monks watching, glass doll, decorated toy elephant, temple/hut surrounded by trees and a fence, close up of monk, 2 monks, man sitting on a throne, monks standing outside the temple, 1 monk, group of monks standing outside the temple, man standing at the entrance holding a gun, mangled dog/wolf, statue of a smiling lion, building with decorative smoke stacks on the roof, 3 men walking down a path through the forest, people walking up to temples, man on a roof overlooking a village playing a long horn, others also on the roof overlooking a village playing a long horn, others also on the roof, man in a jacket tying something, wearing a camera around his neck looking out at the mountains, side of a building, huge mansion and property--on a hill surrounded by water, people walking around at the bottom of the hill, people riding horses, group walking down a path at the bottom of the hill, zoom out of a hill, Lowell Thomas and monks at the bottom, monk using binoculars, Lowell Thomas holding a little girl, people holding decorative containers, monk shaking hands with a man wearing religious/cultural clothing, Lowell Thomas talking to monk, standing at the bottom of the hill with monks and man wearing religious clothing, walking through the property, others along the walls bowing as they walk through, old woman sitting talking to a monk. ; Format: 35mm; Picture: Black & White; Audio: ; Type: Negative
; Format: 35mm; Picture: N/A - Audio track only; Audio: Optical; Type: Negative

Fish laying out on rocks. Donkey's with cargo and men walking along path. Shot of river. Man standing next to table with cloths/fabrics. Native woman. People walking over a bridge. Lowell Thomas Junior with natives. Lowell Thomas with native woman, she puts on a hat. Shots of city and marketplace. Men and donkeys walking through water. Lowell Thomas sits in boat with natives, native man is paddling.; Format: 35mm; Picture: Black & White; Audio: ; Type: Negative

landscapes, LT speaking, map of tibet; Format: 35mm; Picture: Black & White; Audio: ; Type: Negative

Audio Track: Lowell Thomas Jr. narrates about Tibetans carrying Lowell Thomas and other heavy loads throughout Tibet and the journey/flight back home.; Format: 35mm; Picture: N/A - Audio track only; Audio: Optical; Type: Negative
; Format: 35mm; Picture: N/A - Audio track only; Audio: Optical; Type: Negative

Lowell Thomas and Lowell Thomas Jr. narrate the middle of trip to Tibet mail service giving of presents, presenting of eggs, Tibetan plateau. Buildings made of rock, visiting nunneries. Yellow & red hats, monks, differences, most popular dog of Tibet, peasant homes. Down into Lhasa - crossing Song Po river; Format: 35mm; Picture: N/A - Audio track only; Audio: Optical; Type: Negative

Lowell Thomas and Lowell Thomas Jr. narrate the loading of donkeys with equipment problems on way to Tibet. Heading communism in TIbet, describing wildlife - 1st mastery of trips - red & yellow hats LTJ describes trip into tibet; Format: 35mm; Picture: N/A - Audio track only; Audio: Optical; Type: Negative

Lowell Thomas and Lowell Thomas Jr. narrate the spending time w/Indian government, final prep for caravan one of last maharaja of India on the way to Lhasa. Transportation contracting beginning of trip LTJ narrates. w music. ; Format: 35mm; Picture: N/A - Audio track only; Audio: Optical; Type: Negative

Audio Track: Lowell Thomas Jr. narrating Tibet expedition, noting differences between Tibetans and westerners. Lowell Thomas briefly takes over, speaking about silk scarf ceremony. Lowell Thomas Jr. continues narrating.; Format: 35mm; Picture: N/A - Audio track only; Audio: Optical; Type: Negative

Life in tibet, military uniforms/instruments, from WWI, music, bagpipes, noting of important posts in Tibetan government describes battle w/ China. medicinal methods, palace, LTJ narrates; Format: 35mm; Picture: N/A - Audio track only; Audio: Optical; Type: Negative

Men riding and leading horses through a town, everyone collectively follows the same path, people on horses watch those who walk, people sit by a lake and gamble, people set what seems to be a camp and one person hands out food; Format: 35mm; Picture: Black & White; Audio: ; Type: Negative

People riding donkeys through a busy town, the people of the town seem to be going in the same direction, closeups of many of the townspeople, people spin in circles among a crowd, many men who look like soldiers and politicians come out of a building, people sit and watch what seems to be a play outside; Format: 35mm; Picture: Black & White; Audio: ; Type: Negative

Close up of hat. Lowell Thomas talks to people. Shot of trees and flowers. Lowell and others hike through woods with donkeys. Shots of people talking. Man looks over book in house. Shots of more flowers. People eating and meshing leaves inside pots. More traveling. Man pets dog. Shots of flowers. Traveling. Shot of someone's foot. More traveling,; Format: 35mm; Picture: Black & White; Audio: ; Type: Negative

Opening credits. Lowell Thomas talks to a woman in front of a map. The woman takes notes. Shots of a palace/city. Pilots talk among one another. Shot of terrain. Tibet is shown on two different maps. Pilot in airplane doing his job. Plane starts moving. People walk through town,buses drive. People carry crates over their heads. Car slowly drives. Man smiles at camera. Train moves along tracks. Lowell Thomas and another man cross a bridge. Lowell Thomas stands underneath a waterfall. Shot of terrain. Several men in suits talk to each other. Shot of city/palace. Man examines flowers. Two men talk, in next shot one of them dances. Holding a piece of paper, Lowell Thomas talks to another male.People pack cargo onto donkeys. Shots of different men smiling/looking at camera. Man gets up from floor with large crate on his back. Man then touches his hat.; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type: Negative
Same as 1868.05 and 1868.06; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type: Negative
Positive version of 1863.03; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type: Negative

People with masks stand around, one talks to Lowell Thomas. Lowell Thomas clasps hands together and kneels as if he's praying. Shot of crowd talking. People with masks perform, spinning and dancing. Others play instruments as crowd watches. Men walking in line, More dancing and spinning done by people in masks. Crowd patiently sitting. Close up of man and woman, camera focuses on their embellishments. People sit by lake, woman stands with her son, holding his hand. People, some with umbrellas, walk down the street. People in uniform ride around on horses. People walking around the town.; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type: Negative

People riding on horses or walking, some have children strapped to their backs, or umbrellas, or large hats. They walk up a hill. Different shots of people traveling . Woman holds little boy's hand. Group sits by lake. Close up of blanket with coins sprawled out. People huddle up as if a photo is about to be taken, Camera focuses on woman's jewelry. People spin and dance in circles. Line of men, monks, and officers in uniform walk i line around the town, People dance and spin in circles. Majority of crowd watches with hats perched on their heads, or some scarf. People in praying position. Masked people drive stick in opening between their arms. Someone holds out a cup, masked person pours them a drink. Person drinks. ; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type: Negative

Exactly the same as LTP 1864.02 - A group of people are conversing, Lowell Thomas poses with a family that seems native to the region, there appears to be a castle in the distance, people occupy and maneuver through the streets; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type:

A group of people talking, a young Lowell Thomas poses with a family that seems native to the region, a view of what seems to be a castle in the distance, people that I assume to be political leaders gather; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type:
Lowell Thomas meets some of the Tibetan locals, men hand out rice, LT meets people who appear to be monks, LT receives a gift from the Tibetans,; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type:
Exactly the same as 1865.01; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type:
Negative version of 1868.02; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type:
Positive version of 1865.03; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type:
Negative version of 1863.02; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type:
Positive version of 1865.05; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type:

Man sitting down with puppy next to him, churning beads and another object. Woman churns butter as another pours something into the churner occasionally. Woman shakes wooden crate. Women holds child. Man with missing teeth smiles at the camera. Man does body motion in front of group of people as others pass by. Crowd of people dance. Shot of the palace, children, and people in crowded streets. Lowell Thomas receives scarf from man. Lowell Thomas rides on horse . Shots of natives smiling. Donkeys carry cargo through river. Close up of Lowell Thomas on horse. People, including Lowell Thomas, usher buffaloes. Lowell Thomas receives another scarf. Close up of natives. People pack cargo onto donkeys. Shots of buffaloes. Lowell Thomas leans over rock and hovers hand over flowers. ; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type:

Horses carrying cargo along rocky road. Lowell Thomas looking at flowers. Animals in open plain. Shots of different people. Lowell Thomas takes scarf from man and shakes his hand. Donkeys carry cargo across river. Shots of town/city. Man doing exercise. Shots of woman tending to babies and completing other tasks. Man sitting down in roves with beads and charms, a puppy sits next to him.; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type:

People walking or riding donkey/horse. Different shots of woman with her child. People sitting in circle. Close up of necklace. People walking in and out of palace. People dancing and spinning. Men walking in line. Negative version of 1866.04; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type:

"Out of this world sound print part 3" Men riding on horses, people walking. Man settling himself on horse. People sitting next to lake. Close up of blanket and hat. Women and men dressed up in robes. Shot of palace yard. People spinning and dancing. Numerous shots of people in black robes walking in line.People dancing, crowd sits and watches. Different shots of crowd. People wearing masks, girl playing instrument. ; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type:
Woman and man (probably royalty) talk. People walking around and shots of palace. Negative version of 1866.06; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type:

People bow as others walk past. Lowell Thomas holding child. Close up of hate. Shots of palace and mountains. Shots of people walking around and down palace steps. Man playing instrument. People walking down path. Dog with fake Lion mane barks. Shot of painting/art. Man sitting next to flowers. Shots of different men.; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type:

Man laughing, Close up of hat. Lowell Thomas and other men, talk among each other. People go to place in middle of the woods. Different shots of trees and flowers. Lowell Thomas and others leave camp to go through woods. Lowell Thomas scratches head, someone else does the same thing. Inside a room, someone reads a book. Man stoops down besides flowers. Shots of different flowers. Group travel on donkeys. They sit down and eat. Travel with donkeys again. Man pets dog. Shots of different flowers. More traveling on/with donkeys. Close up of someone's foot, foot has blisters. More donkey traveling ; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type:
Exactly the same as LTP 1864.04; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type:

Lowell Thomas and his crew lead bulls on a trail, they stop briefly and LT catches fish by hand, the supplies are moved from the bulls onto a boat, LT and Jr. take a separate boat across a lake, the supplies are then moved onto donkeys and they continue on their way, LT and Jr. receive scarves from important looking people; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type:
Exactly the same as LTP 1867.03; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type:

Lowell Thomas stands with monks, LT converses with a monk, someone drops rice in peoples' bowls, LT looks back at the castle like structure he was in with the monks, LT presents a document to someone, people hold up he Tibetan flag, Someone gives LT a box like object; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type:
Exactly the same as 1867.05; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type:
Opt neg, orchestral music- message from lhasa to new delhi arranging supplies from america to lhasa, need supples for 3 months, same as prior. ; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type:

Man in robes stands in front of shrine like structure. Shot of buildings. Women lines up, holding sticks. Shots of crates with fruits and vegetables. Groups and large crowds sauntering around the city. Donkeys with cargo. Men hammering away. Shot of plains. Lowell Thomas receives scarves from men. Group of people on small boat sailing. People walking through water along with donkeys and cargo. Woman holding dog, another one brushes her own hair. Someone tends to fields. People on boat sailing across water, one person paddling. Lowell Thomas and others catch fish with their hands. Shot of water. Men and donkeys ravel into village. Woman holds up two dogs.; Format: 35mm; Picture: Black & White; Audio: ; Type:

Lowell Thomas Jr. appears to be speaking with monks, a man paints what seems to be the Buddha in his palace, Lowell Thomas and Jr. among a crowd of monks, view of the Buddha's palace, a monk ringing bells, a group of people walking forward, closeup of Lowell Thomas sitting with a monk, closeup of a monk is a garden, a very large group gather outside, people hand out rice, closeup of a man that seems to be a Tibetan general; Format: 35mm; Picture: Black & White; Audio: ; Type: Negative

LTJ walking around gardens in Tibet crossing river looking at Dalai Llama palace loading boats (end of journey) horses swimming LTJ smeaking, LT after fall, getting carried across terrain. Cuts back n forth of footage throughout trip, images of dalai llama and palace. LT disembarking plane. ; Format: 35mm; Picture: Black & White; Audio: ; Type:
Map of Tibet; Format: 35mm; Picture: Black & White; Audio: ; Type: Negative

scopecontent.p: Title cards for Reels 6-10; Format: 35mm; Picture: Black & White; Audio: ; Type: Positive

People and donkeys carrying a lot of cargo, people and all their donkeys travel along the same path, the people who were leading the donkeys sit down to eat, Lowell Thomas reads a letter and speaks to the men and goes to their camp; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type:
Positive version of 1870.01; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type:

People walking through garden. People on boat, palace can be seen in background. Shot of mountains, Man talks to camera. Shot of terrain. Man hoists himself onto horse. Several people carry bed together on shoulders, Lowell Thomas is on it, he waves. Shots of group carrying Lowell Thomas. Officer touches Lowell's knee as another places a blanket in front of him. People carry him around again through open plains and mountains. Car passes by people who are mining. Shot of plane. People spin and dance. Man walks down stage in front of crowd. Lowell Thomas comes out of plane on crutches. Shot of terrain. "The End" pops up on screen.; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type:

Man touching hat. Person sits down with large crate on their back. People packing cargo into donkey. Man dances. Two men talk. Man examines flower. Shot of house, then terrain. Man stands under small waterfall. Shot of train moving along tracks. People carry cargo over their heads. Lowell Thomas talks. Shots of city. Plane flying, Tibet on map is shown. Shot of terrain from view of plane. Pilots smiling. Shot of palace/city. Lowell Thomas talking to woman in front of large map. Credits.; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type:
Positive version of 1868.03; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type:
Same as 1868.01; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type:
Positive version of 1868.05; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type:
16mm optical audio printed on 35mm; Format: 35mm; Picture: ; Audio: ; Type:
Map of Tibet; Format: 35mm; Picture: Black & White; Audio: ; Type: Negative

Men stand around cars outside of a building, a view of a tall building, two people on motorcycles drive past various landscapes buildings, tunnels, traffic, and city views.; Format: 35mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Negative

Lowell Thomas wearing hat and suit talking to a man, pointing occasionally. Lowell Thomas holding object outside, man turns to face him. Man writes something down. Varying overhead shots of city/buildings. Single shot of art before returning to city shots. People walking with luggage, boarding vehicle. ; Format: 35mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Negative

Closeups of a man that may be Lowell Thomas with a parrot on his shoulder, closeup of another old man, the man then has the bird perched on his hand, LT and the old man have a conversation in a boat; Format: 35mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Negative
People on rowboats, the men appear to reach a dead end, they get out of the water with their boats, view of the lake and surrounding forest; Format: 35mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Negative

An old man standing next to a guy with binoculars, Lowell Thomas and another man sit in the back of a car, several people are standing at the top of the steps of a large building, Lowell Thomas speaks to one of the men standing at the stairs, people walk out of an airplane; Format: 35mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Negative

A guy on a small boat in the middle of a lake, view of the tall trees on the coast, gut-like houses in the distance, a man who is smoking holds onto a line/rope, Soldiers lift up a pole, several people gather outside of the hut houses which are actually pretty big; Format: 35mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Negative

Trees and waterfall. Rocks in river. Shot of large river/lake with boats, trees in the background. Various shots of same river with people sailing in boats. Previous shots repeat.; Format: 35mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Negative

A man in shades and a hat sitting down, clapboard "scene A63, take 1," Lowell Thomas goes and sits down with the man in glasses, LT and others sit in a boat, closeups of people that look like farmers, clapboard "Scene 336H, take 3,"; Format: 35mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Negative

An old man covers his mouth as he reaches for something in the water, closeup of another old man wearing a cowboy hat, clapboard "Scene 19, take 1," two men sitting on a rock looking towards the water, one of the men may be Lowell Thomas though it is unclear; Format: 35mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Negative

A garden-like area outside of what appears to be a house, a wall with a colorful mural on it, clapboard "Scene 18, take 3," clapboard "Scene 17, take 2," the outside of a house which has statues and plants outside, large office buildings, view of a small city, a car and motorcycle on the side of a road, cars driving along the road; Format: 35mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Negative

A small town at the base of a mountain, view of a few dead trees and the barren landscape, view of a large building with cars parked outside, a running river with some vegetation around it, clapboard "Scene B38, take 1," a man coming out of the river, closeup of a young man; Format: 35mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Negative

A statue of a sitting man, a line of statues of standing people in front of a giant stone tablet, a closeup of the inscription on the giant stone tablet, two lines of statues facing each other between two giant stone tablets, a car in a parking lot with giant stone tablets and statues in the background, a buildings and a road, a person swimming in a swimming pool, a courtyard full of statues, a courtyard with jets of water on either side and a statue in the middle, a street with streetlights, a view down a broad street, a building with a tree in front of it, a house on a corner, a car parked on the street in front of a building.; Format: 35mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Negative

Closeup of a young man, foliage, a mountainside, the side of a building with the wilderness in the background, transmission towers, two men in a carriage and Lowell Thomas may be one of them; Format: 35mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Negative

Varying shots of flowers in foreground and large stone wall/mountain in background along with water fall. Shots of two men standing on a rock. More shots of flowers/trees/waterfall.; Format: 35mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Negative

A person walks by a body of water at the foot of a mountain, view of the mountain and a waterfall, closeup on the waterfall, people standing on the mountain, various mountain views, a hand covers the camera, mountain and waterfall views, a man standing at the edge of a body of water on the bottom of the frame, the man bends down and reaches into the water, mountain and tree views, person looks up at mountain, hand covers camera.; Format: 35mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Negative
A building that seems to be a church in a forest, buildings on the side of a road, clapboard "Los Caracas"; Format: 35mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Negative

A pond with trees and mountains, two people on a boat, men pulling the boat into water, four men in two boats on the water, men getting out of the boat, a man walks towards another man who is pulling a boat, a closeup on a man with binoculars, he walks through grass and looks through his binoculars, a man's face is in the foreground with the man in binoculars in the background, a tiled wall with plants growing at its base, a large building with lots of windows, a truck with a building in the background, cars and two motorcycles driving down the road, a curved road with trees on the side and a mountain in the background.; Format: 35mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Negative

Someone in the water, clapboard "Scene B37, take 1," two men attempt to take something out of the water, one of the men gets in a boat while the other walks along the water, a view of the horizon of the lake, scenery of and around the lake; Format: 35mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Negative

View of the machine that pulls cable cars, a mountain in the distance with a building on top of it, clapboard "Scene X42, take 1," view of the mountainside; Format: 35mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Negative
A town visible in the distance, a barren landscape, view of the sides of buildings, boats heading towards a dock; Format: 35mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Negative

did.unittitle: The Amazing Spectacle at Bikini Island

scopecontent.p: The Amazing Spectacle at Bikini, Movietone News. Remarkable films of Man's 5th Atomic Bomb exploding in underwater test. Described by Lowell Thomas. Film equipment is positioned for the event, complete with lead doors designed to close after film is taken. Shots of submarines and warships stationed before the blast. Admiral Parsons[sp?] boards the U.S.S. Mount McKinley ship to report to Admiral Brandy. Water is tested for radioactivity. Blast occurs and "thousands of tons of water" mushroom above the surface, causing massive destruction. Copyright MCMXLVI, Distributed by Twentieth Century Fox Film Corp.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Black & White; Audio: Optical; Type: Positive

Footage of atomic bomb exploding [Bikini?]. Second explosion creates large spray of water and launches a huge wave of water towards warships. Drone pilot covers one eye to protect from the radioactive blast.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Black & White; Audio: Optical; Type: Positive

"The Story of Bertha Spafford Vester". Original Bertha Vester film produced by Jerry T. Ballantine. With an introduction and conclusion by Lowell Thomas in front of a world map. This complete biographical print tells the story of Bertha Stafford Vester, an American humanitarian whose work in Jerusalem began before World War I and Lowell Thomas tries to raise money for her organization.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

The film starts with war scenes including bombs, soldiers running through fields and throwing grenades, and tanks being blown up. The scenes change to a priest and nun who are playing and singing with children. A band plays while a Catholic procession goes on and the following recordings are of the priest being with the older boys and the nun with the girls and children. The boys learn sewing and carpentry skills and the girls sew and sing. A few nuns care for children with disabilities and one speaks to the camera, for a lengthy time, outside of a playground. The main priest and nun drive into Rome and take 3 young girls sightseeing in places like the Parthenon and the Trevi Fountain. In the next scene the priest and nun take the girls to meet the Pope, who speaks with the youngest girl the most. Scenes of kids playing outside with the priest and nun are played before the film ends and the credits roll. ; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

"The Story of Bertha Spafford Vester". Original Bertha Vester film produced by Jerry T. Ballantine. With an introduction by Lowell Thomas in front of a world map. This complete biographical print tells the story of Bertha Stafford Vester, an American humanitarian whose work in Jerusalem began before World War I.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: Optical; Type: Positive

Lowell Thomas saying he is in Vermont and he started to talk about the first world war and Allenby . Lowell Thomas then started to talk about Bertha Vester and how she's one of the greatest women of all times. He said that she's almost in her 90th years and she had lived in the city of Jerusalem. He also said she was one those who took part in the surrender of Jerusalem when Allenby's army had drove out the Turks and how he was lucky enough to be there at the time. Lowell Thomas started to talk about Mrs. Vester looking after the wounded in a hospital in Jerusalem which was under the control of the Turks. He said how she had ripped a white bed sheet in half and she used half as an white flag and that he also had apart of that flag himself and he said the other half of the flag is in the war museum in London. A narrator started to introduced Bertha Vester and telling all that she had done. Bertha Vester then comes on saying that she had lived in Jerusalem for 84 years and that she was under the Turks for 40 years, 32 years under the British and 17 years under the Arabs but each of them was different. She also said that she had lived in 3 wars. She started talking about her parents and at this time she wasn't born at the time. She was giving a synopsis of why her parents had moved to Jerusalem. Her story started off with saying how her parents had lived in Chicago but then everything was on fire. Her mother had became ill after due to the lost of her home and doctors recommend her going somewhere else. They had traveled to Europe for quite sometime and she had said how her mom was the only survivor of ship that had went down, which her mom 6 children had died in. Her dad had went get her and brought her back to America. After lost they had her dad had decided to to move to Jerusalem. Bertha Vester said her dad motivation to move there was because of Jesus. Her explanation was that he had lived, suffer and conquered there and her dad had lived suffer and now he wanted to conquer also. In 1881 Bertha was 3 years old, as she goes on telling her story she said she had never been to school a day in her life. She was thought to paint by an English governor when she was about 5 years old. The narrator had started to explain the things that was going on at the timer and during war time she fed 1700 people a day in a small soup kitchen that was started by her mother. Mrs. Vester also had took 1600 men that was badly wounded and sick in her care. The greatest moment of her life was when she had brought the mayor of Jerusalem to meet the General to surrender. As the audio went to another story she had compared the no room in an inn story to a no room in the hospital story on Christmas Eve. Because she had took in the baby and many other babies she had started a children hospital which became one of her greatest achievements.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Black & White; Audio: Optical, Magnetic; Type: Positive

Bertha Vester narrates a "Christmas story" with the help of Lowell Thomas. Bertha is an American who was raised in Jerusalem. Lowell Thomas interjects and talks about how in 1917, Edmond Allenby became Commander and Chief. (While Bertha was growing up in Jerusalem.) Bertha became a nurse and continued to nurse men from the Holy Land despite the fact that America had broken off relations to Turkey and was not on good terms with the city of Jerusalem. Lowell Thomas explains why the Mayor of Jerusalem ended up surrendering his city to Allenby. Bertha took the Mayor (who she was nursing) to surrender. She went to Bethlehem on Christmas Eve and brought a sick mother and newborn to the hospital. The next day she found out the mother had died but the child survived. She took the child in and named him Noel. She remained friends with Edmond Allenby as well as T.E. Lawrence. Lowell Thomas ends the story by nominating Bertha Vester "the greatest American woman of our era."; Format: 16mm; Picture: N/A - Audio track only; Audio: Magnetic; Type: Positive

Lowell Thomas introduction. The following scenes are separated by long scenes of an elderly woman addressing a crowd outside a church: title- "The Story of Bertha Spafford Vester"; nature scenes and a flower painting; bones; fire and torches; still shot of two soldiers; woman washing clothes in basin outside; pediatric clinic; three women talking at a table; and Lowell Thomas conclusion.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Black & White; Audio: ; Type: Positive

The film started off with a cottage cheese commercial that can be used at breakfast, lunch and at supper time with dessert. For breakfast, the commercial showed a person hand spreading the cottage cheese on omelette. For lunch, the commercial showed a person hand spreading the cottage cheese on bread and placing peaches on top. For supper time dessert, the commercial showed a person hand spreading the cottage cheese on pie. The film then showed a Hood Ice cream commercial with an inspector that goes by the name check point Charlie looking at strawberries, approving ice cream, and in the ice cream factor, and it also showed him sitting at his desk eating an ice cream sundae. The film then cuts back to the cottage cheese commercial and then cuts back the hood ice cream commercial. There was an back an forth between both commercial multiple times then the film went to another commercial of a little boy throwing food into a bear mouth. This commercial was about Devil Ham Sandwich and that little boys and elder men can eat it also. In the background was the bear doing like a wave single trying to get the attention of the little boy and the man. The film then goes to B&M Brick Oven baked beans commercial. The commercial started off with hand passing the jar of baked beans from one hand to the next. The commercial also show a family of four which includes a wife, husband, daughter and son sitting at the table having dinner with baked beans as option. Each of them were engaged into an conversation and then film goes to classical music playing. The film then goes back to bake bean commercial and then it showed the devil ham commercial. Between the devil ham commercial and the bake bean commercial it was showed about twelve times each with classical music splitting between. The films also goes back to the cottage cheese commercial and the hood ice cream commercial which played at least seven times in the last end of the film. Ballantine Films, Inc.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color, Black & White; Audio: Optical, Magnetic; Type: Positive

Lowell Thomas tells "The Story of Bertha Vester." Bertha was a woman from Jerusalem who got into nursing during the war. Her life became hectic, taking care of wounded soldiers. She tells the story of how a woman in Bethlehem went into labor. She had to help her get to a hospital. She gave birth to the baby on Christmas Eve. The parents ended up not being able to take care of their child, so they gave him to Bertha. That is how she began her orphanage in Jerusalem.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: Optical; Type: Positive

LT telling the story of the fall of Jerusalem during WWI. He starts by saying that this story is like the Christmas story in the bible. He centers the story around a woman, Bertha Vesters, he met during the fall of Jerusalem in 1917. He calls Bertha " a modern day Florence Nightingale". Her family moved to "the holy land" from Chicago. Bertha grew up in the City, and worked as nurse. Field Marshall Allenby drives the Turks out of Jerusalem. The Mayor of the Holy City is asked to surrender. This mayor goes to Bertha at the hospital and asks her the protocol for surrender. Bertha cuts a white bed sheet, and marches with the Mayor of Jerusalem out of the City wall to help him surrender. ; Format: 35mm; Picture: N/A - Audio track only; Audio: Magnetic; Type: Positive

Lowell Thomas narrates multiple takes in which he speaks about the explosive zone of the Middle East and praises an American woman who now has a monument in Jerusalem. So many mistakes were made, Thomas hardly gets a full sentence out before starting again. ; Format: 35mm; Picture: N/A - Audio track only; Audio: Magnetic; Type: Positive

scopecontent.p: Lowell Thomas speaks to the camera from behind a desk. He talks about the invention of Cinerama. Next, he shows us his collection of airplane models and speaks about his enthusiasm for aviation. He invites the viewers to join him on a search for the wonders of the world. "We will do this through the magic if Cinerama."; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: Optical; Type: Positive

We see a woman in a red dress several times in different locations in the city. Cut to shots of Moroccan citizens in the marketplace and women balancing bowls on their heads. The woman in the red dress and a woman in a blue dress play with a lion cub. Separated by leader, we see the same woman who was in red now on a beach in Rio. She looks out from a balcony at the Christ the Redeemer Statue. Close up of statue. The roll ends with shots of a festival taking place in Rio.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

Several opening shots of billboards written in Japanese. We are shown the outside of a temple. There are a couple shots of the inside of the temple but it is too dark to really see anything. We are shown a pile of sandals on the ground that people may have taken off to meditate. Cut to exterior shots of a different temple. Young Japanese children walk to school with their backpacks. The children play ball on their break.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

Japanese children are shown playing at recess. Cut to shots of a large Buddha statue. Adults and children run up a steep bridge going over a channel. Kids slide down the bridge as if it is a slide. Cut to shots of a marketplace. Vendors sell food and a variety of trinkets. Young boys sit by a pond holding fishing poles. A group of young boys peer into the camera with confused expressions. Cut to shots of a large house being built. The roll ends with shots of a train station.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

Japan: city streets and an assembly of people (some of whom may be U.S. military) and a man and woman who appear to be leaders.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

Landscape shots of green rolling hills. Iranian women in veils dance, waving colorful scarves. The men of the village watch from the roof of a house made of clay. Lowell Thomas Jr. fills his car with gas at a station. Shots of some sort of monument with a statue of a man meditating on top. Cut to people doing tricks off of a high dive. Close ups of one particular man doing different dives into a pool. Shots of people posing and smiling by the pool. We are shown the inside of a temple/palace where there is an altar and a throne. It is lit by candlelight.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

In Tehran, Iran we are shown the exteriors of several buildings. Some ancient-looking, some modern. We are shown the interior of a building and shots of a glittering chandelier.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

Lowell Thomas Jr. speaks with a decorated Iranian officer. The officer gives Lowell a tour of the building they are in front of.They walk around a garden in the back and Lowell Thomas Jr. stops to take close up pictures of the flowers.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

A group of Iranian men exercise together. They do push ups and upper body workouts in unison. A man throws heavy clubs into the air and catches them. He does other tricks with the clubs while the others watch. Lowell Thomas Jr. tries to lift the clubs. The group of men laugh and lift Lowell over their heads. The roll ends with shots of flowers and Lowell Thomas Jr. examining them.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

People in Tehran wait for a train. A building under construction is filmed. The camera focuses on some of the construction men in the higher levels. Cut to traffic in the street and groups of people walking down the sidewalk. Cut to men sitting in a circle in lawn chairs under some trees. There are tents behind them.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

Men on their knees pick and collect wheat from a field. Donkeys carry piles of grass back to the town. Landscape shots of the green and yellow hills in the distance. A little girl wearing a veil walks through the long grass. We see the men and women who live in the clay houses close by. Close up's on the men of the village.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

Men in a field battle each other with long reeds that act as whips. The children nearby mimic them. Cut to shots of a man painting a tapestry. Then the camera focuses on a man sculpting metal bowls and plates. Close up shots of paintings inside a mosque. The roll ends with us watching workers using machines at a wool factory.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

A camera is rested on the dashboard of a car. It films as it drives down the streets of Tehran. This makes up a majority of the roll. There is a brief break where the camera films a swimming pool from a distance. The car pulls into a gas station and continues to drive around; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

Middle Eastern men are holding rifles trying to track and shoot down a bird. Men slide down a sandy hill on their feet while children milk goats. The camera films the outside of a large building (mosque?) with a shallow pool and flowers in the front. Shots of the religious artwork inside the mosque. The roll ends with long shots of different buildings and Iranian architecture.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

Three officials open a large, decorated, heavy gate. Shots of buildings with modern architecture, especially a large white building. A car pulls up in front of the gate. Three men exit the car and walk through the gates. Shots of different interior aspects of the building: a desk, tile floors, wall artwork. Lowell Thomas Jr. points to some of the art on the wall. He walks around in the gardens in front of a different white building. (This one has a statue of a man holding a spear on a horse in the front.) More shots of tiled art on the walls, followed by shots of windows and some sort of throne with jewels embedded in it. Close ups of more furniture with jewels in it. Gems are on display in glass boxes. Lowell Thomas Jr. speaks with a man in front of a wall of gems.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

The camera films the outside of a large museum-like building with pillars in the front. We watch as people enter and exit. Overhead shots of people and cars making their way down a busy street. The camera stays on this street for awhile. Cut to a shot of train tracks. The camera waits as a train slowly passes. Back on the street, men guide donkeys that are carrying around sacks on their backs.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

The camera focuses on a statue of a man (officer/general) on a horse. Lowell Thomas Jr. examines a wall made of crystal or glass. He then examines a throne with jewels embedded in it. A little girl points to red jewels contained within a glass case. The camera focuses on a globe of the world made entirely of gems. The last shot of the roll is of three swards in cases covered in jewels.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

The film starts off with the showing of horses and men putting things on the horses back. The film them showed men uniforms riding on horses up a hill. There was landscape shot of mountains and it showed a plane flying and then it showed a plane landing. The film showed a man working and it showed two cows and then it showed men standing in a line and it also showed some of them talking. The film showed a man raking hay.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

Decorative art of a lion, and a sun. A fountain with cherubs in a garden. Men performing a traditional dance throwing clubs, ringing bells and spinning while wearing leather pants. Soldiers standing outside holding a banner that reads "Iran". Fishermen using nets with Lowell Thomas Jr. and company. Also[Panning for metals?]. The men then cooked and ate dinner together.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

scopecontent.p: Film started off at an airport then cuts to different landscape shots. The film showed ships sailing. It also showed men in uniforms walking and some of them went on the plane. The film showed cars driving pass and then the film cuts to a crowd of people at a social gathering and cuts again to the showing of a clock church. The film showed pyramids and someone riding on an animal and it also showed people by a poolside.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

This footage was taken somewhwere in East Asia using the Chinese writing system (likely China itself). Scenes include city streets, men on a ship, landscapes and settlements, and a ship in a storm.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Black & White; Audio: Optical; Type: Positive

The film showed a cow, it showed children walking and climbing up steps, it showed building and statues, and it showed showed people working. The film showed a woman giving a baby a bath, it showed people carrying things on their back, it showed women selling things, it showed people washing clothes, showed a man making pottery and it showed children smiling. ; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

The film showed trains passing by, it showed people getting on the train, it showed children sliding down slides. The film showed Asian children being taught how to brush their teeth. The film showed a building that was on fire. They spoke in a different language. The film showed people on ferris wheels, it showed people swimming ant catching clams. The film showed women working in a factory cleaning out the clams and taking the pearls out of them and making a pearl necklaces. There where traditional Asian dance being shown. The film showed people doing traditional prayer. The film also showed people on a plane that was close to a volcano. The film showed people playing basketball, playing golf, skiing, flying kite, fencing, karate, wrestling, and showed a sword fight. The film showed men and women working in factories.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Black & White; Audio: Optical; Type: Positive

President Kim honoring Ms. Marion Anderson's humanitary work. She sings 'whole world in his hands', children sing getting to know you at Saigon Airport. ; Format: 35mm; Picture: Black & White; Audio: Optical; Type: Positive

Lowell Thomas Jr. receives his diploma and salutes his fellow pilots.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

The camera zooms out and we see Lowell Thomas Sr. sitting next to them reading a newspaper. Lowell Thomas Jr. walks through the flower garden in his father's backyard. He sniffs the flowers next to him and begins to laugh.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

The camera seemed to be on a boat sailing as it was capturing a view of water and mountains. Film showed people dressed up socializing and then cuts to a different group of people. The film cuts again to different people dancing and playing instruments. Film showed another game of baseball and then cuts to people ice skating and it also cuts back to another baseball game. The film showed people on horses, cuts to people skiing, and cuts back to people on horses. The film showed a house with flowers garden and then it showed another house with snow falling. scopecontent.p: Tidal waves caused by undersea quakes wreck vast havoc, described by Lowell Thomas. Film showed tidal waves coming in and there were debris being washed upon the shores. Lowell Thomas said, "Tremendous earthquake at the bottom of the sea off the Aleutians, south of the Dutch Harbor. Tidal waves swept to the California Coast and Hawaii, in the city of Hilo, the center of devastation. The film showed a boat hurled into a house and a telegraph pole rammed in a direct building. Lowell Thomas had said, "Tidal waves roll to the coast of South America, Chilies seven thousand miles from the Aleutians." The film showed demolishes houses with cars on top of the debris. The film also showed little children and dogs getting off of van. The film cuts to ab airplane flying over mountains and then cuts to Air Force. The film showed Lowell Thomas standing with four gentlemen and a woman. The film cuts back to a man flying the plane from the cockpit. The film then showed women and then cuts to a someone spinning a globe. The film ends with the showing of different paintings.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color, Black & White; Audio: ; Type: Positive

Horse-drawn carriages push through the snow as people gather to watch bob sledding. Lowell Thomas is among the audience. Scenes change to a large cruise ship on the water where people play games on deck and then to views of a bay from a large house near a harbor. The rest of the film shows miscellaneous scenes of people relaxing on a beach and passing by on a street where everyone drives horse-drawn carts and rides bicycles.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Black & White; Audio: ; Type: Positive

Lowell Thomas and a group of friends picnic in the park. There are several shots of people skiing through trees. Cut to military men in the desert looking at cactus and wildflowers.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

A very young Lowell Thomas visits the small town of Cripple Creek, Colorado. He walks around the center of the town with a few men in fancy suits and people are shown walking down the streets with their dogs and taking pictures in an old-fashioned fire truck. The majority of the film shows landscape views of the town and surrounding area where men work in large coal mines.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

Lowell Thomas and a few other guys take a boat out to fish. They're shown catching a few fish and there's a short scene where Thomas uses fire wood to light his cigar.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Black & White; Audio: ; Type: Positive

Lowell Thomas, a couple of other adults, and a group of kids are shown playing and diving in a pool before a landscape shot of a large property with a pool, barn, and tennis court is played. The rest of the film shows a young boy and woman riding horses.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Black & White; Audio: ; Type: Positive

People walk through a marketplace and observe different items they want to purchase. A young woman stands by a tree with red and pink flowers on it. She pets her golden retriever. She gathers flowers and makes a bouquet. Lowell Thomas practices his golf swing in an open field. Fran Thomas walks around the streets of Rio. We get a last close up of the back of the Christ the Redeemer statue.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

Lowell Thomas introduces the charming inhabitants of Quaker Hill, on the border of New York and Connecticut, that lead to a picturesque life there. Part one.; Format: 16mm; Picture: N/A - Audio track only; Audio: Optical; Type: Positive

"Quaker Hill or The Simple Life". This film shows the charming inhabitants of Quaker Hill, on the border of New York and Connecticut, that lead to a picturesque life there. Notable figures include Lowell Thomas, his wife "Fran" Thomas and son Lowell Thomas, Jr., and former President Herbert Hoover. Part one.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

"Quaker Hill or The Simple Life". This film shows the charming inhabitants of Quaker Hill, on the border of New York and Connecticut, that lead to a picturesque life there, including their baseball games, golf matches, and fishing. Notable figures include Lowell Thomas, his wife "Fran" Thomas, son Lowell Thomas, Jr., and daughter-in-law Mary Taylor "Tay" Thomas, flying ace and race car driver Eddie Rickenbacker, boxer James Joseph "Gene" Tunney, and many more. Part two.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

Lowell Thomas introduces the charming inhabitants of Quaker Hill, on the border of New York and Connecticut, that lead to a picturesque life there. Part two.; Format: 16mm; Picture: N/A - Audio track only; Audio: Optical; Type: Positive

scopecontent.p: A woman and three young girls explore a nature trail. The girls point to every sign as they pass. Lowell Thomas plays with a Huskey in the snow. He lets the dog lick his face and we watch as it chases a ball and bring it back. Cut to a blonde little girl (toddler) playing with a Dalmatian. The baby hugs the dog repeatedly. A red truck stops by a cemetery. Men get out and begin breaking up rocks to make soft ground for a road. Men ride horses on a path through trees. Cut to men skiing down a slope. Men and women stand on a balcony as the sun sets. We see the blonde toddler again playing with flowers from her garden. She walks around as Fran Thomas watches her. More people join the group on the balcony. The little girl finds two other little girls to play with. The three of them walk around the garden picking tulips.; Format: 16mm; Picture: Color; Audio: ; Type: Positive

scopecontent.p: Film started off with a man standing on baseball field with baseball in his hand and then it showed two different baseball team. The film showed people playing baseball and then it cut to two women, a man and three dogs on a step. They were sitting down playing with the dogs and then the film showed them walking. The film cut to two men sitting down on a veranda talking and then cut to men in uniforms camping out as if they were at war.
